messages.already_logged:
You are already logged in.
You can connect your social network account by adding it in user’s account information .
messages.email_already_registered: User with this email is already registered. Please, use password remind function or contact support for help.
messages.couldnt_auth: Authorization unsuccessful. Please, try to log out from social network, re-login into it and then try to re-authorize in allrpg.info.
